summary.name: Virtual Ecstasy
summary.description: A deck for those who want to strip away every inhibition and surrender to a long-distance game where anything is allowed. Fingers type, voice commands, the body obeys. Pleasure is real, even if the screen stands between you.

quests.content: Get completely naked, take a faceless photo and send it to your partner with the message: 'This body is all yours.'
Send a voice message telling your partner everything you want her to do to you with her fingers. No filter.
Write an explicit scene where you're forced to masturbate on her command, describing everything.
Film a short video (5–10 sec) where you touch yourself over your underwear, looking into the camera without saying a word.
Write a message describing exactly what you'd like to do with your tongue to your partner right now.
Record an audio of you masturbating and moaning. No words, just real sounds.
Write step by step what you’re doing while masturbating, thinking of your partner.
Film a short video where you masturbate with one hand while holding the camera focused on your genitals with the other.
Order your partner to come while watching your video or photo. Tell her what you want to see happen.
Write a domination or submission fantasy where your partner is your sexual object.
Write a dirty short monologue describing an orgasm during penetration. Don’t use euphemisms.
Record a video of yourself climaxing or realistically simulating orgasm, and send it immediately to your partner.
Write what you’d do to your partner if she were tied up in front of you, naked and completely at your mercy.
Send a photo of your body messy after orgasm, even just partially.
Come while listening to your partner’s audio or watching her video. Afterwards, just message: 'Yours.'
Write your ultimate dirty talk: the filthiest thing you’d whisper in her ear during sex.
Film your naked body while you slowly caress yourself after orgasm.
Write a message that includes the words 'dirty', 'hunger', 'wet', 'command', and 'inside'. It must make sense.
End the game with an obscene promise you’ll fulfill next time you see each other—written black on white.
